VRT TOPCO LTD

DIRECTORS' REPORT (CONTINUED)
FOR THE YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2020

Post reporting date events
On 31 December 2020 the UK left the European Union. As disclosed in note 27 the Directors consider no adjustment is
required to the results for the period ended 31 December 2020.

Energy and carbon report

Quantification and reporting methodology

The group has followed the 2019 HM Government Environmental Reporting Guidelines. The group has also used the
GHG Reporting Protoccl — Corporate Standard and have used the 2020 UK Government's Conversion Factors for
Company Reporting

Intensity measurement
The chosen intensity measurement ratio is total gross emissions in metric tonnes CQ2e per full time equivalents, the
recommended ratio for the sector.
